THIS IS BAD!

The quality is horrible. For 20 minutes of an episode the files are ca. 100MB (normally 180-250MB), so the color is off, and the image is bad. Some episodes are in MPEG, which is even worse. 

So don't download unless there's nothing else.

As a matter of fact there's nothing else, but I read on wikipedia that:
 "In July 2009, TVShowsOnDVD.com announced that a DVD release for the series is planned for 2010"

My friend downloaded this for me last year, all but "Fizz Ed" plays on my Phillips DivX player, all play with k-lite, miss this show like crazy, awaiting the DVD release, wonder how long it'll take for the bona-fide DVD rip(s) to show up here ;)

When it does, I'll lock in my seed when I'm online!

This is for everyone that have issues about media files being played. Use VLC  media player - Open Source Multimedia Framework and Player. It is the best media player out there. It will play all kinds of files (even flash). It is also FREE! 

I hope this help anyone out there.

http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

Peace!

Fucking great show. Good torrent.

MTV were too cheap to pay copyrights for the music on the soundtrack. That's why there hasn't been a DVD release.

The VHS releases and the future DVD release have been edited and don't contain the original soundtrack. Which sucks a bit but Daria is still awesome anyway.

This isn't the highest quality but it's the most comprehensive Daria torrent out.

Screw MTV... They killed the best decade.
